basics.name: Jan Sáska
basics.summary: Jan is a super technical MTB XCO rider from the Czech Republic, currently the 2025 Elite National Champion. He is constantly exploring ways to improve and innovate in his training rather than sticking to familiar paths. Even without a large team behind him, he has successfully secured sponsors to support a full World Cup season. With the right support, Jan is ready to focus all his energy on racing and aims for consistent top World Cup results.

athletic_career.description: Jan is a first-year Men’s Elite XCO MTB rider competing in both national and international events. In his debut elite World Cup season, he has steadily moved up the ranks, demonstrating technical skill, resilience, and strategic racing ability.

racing.name: 2025 Elite National Championships
racing.description: Crowned Elite National Champion XCO, demonstrating exceptional technical skill, endurance, and racing strategy.

racing.name: European Championships, Melgaço 2025
racing.description: Finished 23rd in the European Championships XCO, showing rapid progression in his first elite season.

racing.name: World Cup 2025 Season
racing.description: Debut elite World Cup season with strong performances: Val di Sole — 56th, Andorra — 55th, Les Gets — 49th.
